aux_program:
% Predicates for (adjacent) cells
cell(R,C) :- setting(row(R)), setting(col(C)).
direction(left;right;up;down).
movement(R,C,R,C+1,right) :- cell(R,C), cell(R,C+1).
movement(R,C,R,C-1,left) :- cell(R,C), cell(R,C-1).
movement(R,C,R+1,C,down) :- cell(R,C), cell(R+1,C).
movement(R,C,R-1,C,up) :- cell(R,C), cell(R-1,C).
adjacent(R1,C1,R2,C2) :- direction(D), movement(R1,C1,R2,C2,D).
level_gen_program:
% The game is played on an 8x6 grid
setting(grid_width(8)).
setting(grid_height(6)).
setting(row(1..H)) :- setting(grid_height(H)).
setting(col(1..W)) :- setting(grid_width(W)).

% Time bound: 15 steps
setting(time_bound(15)).

% The player is randomly placed in the top half
at(RANDINT(1,3),RANDINT(1,8),player).
% The flag is randomly placed in the bottom half
at(RANDINT(4,6),RANDINT(1,8),flag).

% Visualization instructions
decorate(game_type,grid).
decorate(label,flag,font_f024).
decorate(label,player,font_f007).
visibility_program:
% Only a ring of one around the player is visible
observe(fog(R1,C1)) :-
    setting(row(R1)), setting(col(C1)),
    at(R2,C2,player), |C1-C2| >= 2.
observe(fog(R1,C1)) :-
    setting(row(R1)), setting(col(C1)),
    at(R2,C2,player), |R1-R2| >= 2.
observe(at(R,C,O)) :- at(R,C,O), not observe(fog(R,C)).
player_move_program:
% Make a plan once
% consisting of several landmark locations
remember(landmark(1,H-1,2)) :- observe(at(R,C,player)),
    setting(grid_height(H)),
    not memory(made_plan).
remember(landmark(2,H-1,W-1)) :- observe(at(R,C,player)),
    setting(grid_height(H)), setting(grid_width(W)),
    not memory(made_plan).
memory(landmark(R,C)) :- remember(landmark(R,C)).
remember(made_plan).

% Once you've seen the flag, go grab it!
do(move(down)) :- observe(at(R1,C1,player)), observe(at(R2,C2,flag)), R1 < R2.
do(move(up)) :- observe(at(R1,C1,player)), observe(at(R2,C2,flag)), R1 > R2.
do(move(right)) :- observe(at(R,C1,player)), observe(at(R,C2,flag)), C1 < C2.
do(move(left)) :- observe(at(R,C1,player)), observe(at(R,C2,flag)), C1 > C2.

% If you haven't seen the flag yet,
% go to the next landmark that you haven't yet visited
do(move(down)) :- observe(at(R1,C1,player)),
    not observe(at(_,_,flag)),
    not memory(reached_landmark(I)),
    memory(reached_landmark(J)) : memory(landmark(J,_,_)), J < I;
    memory(landmark(I,R2,C2)), R1 < R2.
do(move(up)) :- observe(at(R1,C1,player)),
    not observe(at(_,_,flag)),
    not memory(reached_landmark(I)),
    memory(reached_landmark(J)) : memory(landmark(J,_,_)), J < I;
    memory(landmark(I,R2,C2)), R1 > R2.
do(move(right)) :- observe(at(R,C1,player)),
    not observe(at(_,_,flag)),
    not memory(reached_landmark(I)),
    memory(reached_landmark(J)) : memory(landmark(J,_,_)), J < I;
    memory(landmark(I,R,C2)), C1 < C2.
do(move(left)) :- observe(at(R,C1,player)),
    not observe(at(_,_,flag)),
    not memory(reached_landmark(I)),
    memory(reached_landmark(J)) : memory(landmark(J,_,_)), J < I;
    memory(landmark(I,R,C2)), C1 > C2.

% Once you've reached a landmark, remember this
remember(reached_landmark(I)) :-
    observe(at(R,C,player)), memory(landmark(I,R,C)),
    memory(reached_landmark(J)) : memory(landmark(J,_,_)), J < I.
memory(reached_landmark(I)) :- remember(reached_landmark(I)).
nature_program:
% The player can do at most one action per time step
:- do(X), do(Y), X != Y.

% Effect of move(up;down;left;right): the player moves in the appropriate direction
move_result(R2,C2) :- do(move(D)), direction(D),
    at(R1,C1,player), movement(R1,C1,R2,C2,D).
next(R,C,player) :- move_result(R,C).
next(R,C,player) :- at(R,C,player), not move_result(R',C') : cell(R',C').

% The flag stays in place
next(R,C,flag) :- at(R,C,flag).
goal_program:
% Goal: reach the flag
win :- at(R,C,player), at(R,C,flag).

% You lose if time runs out..
lose(timeout) :- current_time(T), setting(time_bound(S)), T >= S.
